attributes.action: Hold a referndum on electoral reform.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we all know that a change in electoral system from first past the post to a proportional representation system, (AV+ suggested by the jenkins report 1998) would give fairer representation for parties who recieve votes but lack the seats deserved due to the flaws of first past the post. Labour wont hold the referendum on their own because they of all parties have wreaped most of the benefits, plenty of examples of this are in the results of the past general elections, and the fact that Labour did not deliver on the promise of the referendum in 1997 shows their attitude that they are more comfortable in this flawed system
